reviews.review:
Alright, time for a real review. Would I recommend this to a random person to play the game? NO. Would I recommend this game to a friend so that we can play together? YES.
Let me explain why, this game has been out for years and they still haven´t fixed bugs/glitches that existed years Ago. 
-Dropping a Pallet to stun the killer while he is swinging? well guess what, you get Hit even when the pallet is fully dropped ( Happened today April 2, 2021)
- Hitboxes still not fixed ( not a surprise)  
- Me as a Rank 8 killer getting to play against rank 20 survivors and sometimes rank 1 survivors? amazing matchmaking
- not to be against console players but console players are actually a Meme
THE GOOD STUFF
-Visuals are getting nicer and nicer excellent work on the graphics 
- they balanced and they try to keep balancing Perks and killers
-It is actually fun to play with friends

That is It, 4/10 playing alone and when playing with friends I give a solid 6/10 ( there is no middle option so I will give a NO recommending this game)

After 15 hours I can say the game is good. But be sure to play with other players of your level otherwise you're gonna suffer.
Perks are everything on this game and trying to skip the step of progression by trying on harder levels is next to impossible as the game is more inclined toward perks than actual skill in movement so,  be sure to equip your survivor properly.
I do not speak about killers because frankly, I do not like to play as killer, not nearly as fun.

친구든 같이할 사람있으면 좋아요 브리핑이 중요하기때문에
혼자 한다면 손절당하는 겜이라서 전 혼자 안해요 암걸려서 ㅋㅎ
게임은 재밌지만 버그가 많아요 그점이 아쉽네요

so much fun
so much pain

This game is in the middle of fierce fun and a burning ass. It contains many bugs. If it does not scare you, start playing, but nobody's sure you will succeed, 'cause the game is constantly crashing. An unknown mistake will be with you almost every try to play. Toxic insults in a post-game chat will be for you as a daily wish for a good day from your dear family. Be prepared that you will be accused of cheating, although there was another bug and you have nothing to do with it. In general, the game is great. I don’t know why a huge number of players love it, but I am among them. The game draws you into its web. And you do not mind.
Muy buen juego para jugar solo o con amigos, la mezcla perfecta entre diversión y tensión.

By far the best game I've ever played. Many people have different opinions about the game itself and how it plays out. In itself Dead by daylight is a endless loop of the same mission. But it's the people who make it interesting, and the friends you make along the way.
great game, a bit repetitive at times but they add new content consistently and it's always really fun to play
Love playing as both the Survivor and Killer, although one is definitely more stressful than the other.

De los mejores juegos multijugador de Steam, siempre meten contenido nuevo y están atentos a la comunidad, es un gran juego que pudo pasar la prueba del tiempo y mantenerse activo logrando una base de jugadores firme y equilibrada. 10/10

баги стали неотъемлемой частью игры, так что на улучшения можно не надеяться.

обновления делают очень больно

Honestly, this is a really fun game to play when you're playing with friends and not trying. It can be really annoying to play at time with hitboxes being wack but, otherwise i'd recommend playing it to anybody just looking to have fun.

no matter how much i hate this game, i'm always coming back to it, its such a great game even tho the community around it is not the greatest.

have fun in the fog! :]
A cada 100 partidas é possível você ganhar uma se você for ruim igual eu!
I like a horror multiplayer like this, with different killers and different victims to play as.

This game is absolutely amazing and the community is even better. Just greatness all around, the balance is perfect, the matchmaking is impeccable and its polished to perfection. 100% competitive ready.

No co na to říct, když jste vývojář, kterému záleží jen na penězích, tak budete dělat jen skiny, a o samotný gameplay se nestaráte. I po těch letech co je hra venku je celá rozbitá, občas se laguje server, ovládání vás často pošle do prdele a o hitboxech bych tady mohl napsat celou encyklopedii o tom, jak to stojí za hovno. Takže NE ! Nepodporovat tyhle ty sračky a hlavně ne tyto vývojáře co mají vše u prdele a jenom CASH, CASH, CASH. Většina těch skinů stejně stojí za vyliž prdel, takže ani to jim nejde :)
Good game to play with your friends. Gives you a good thrill.

Хочу поругать и похвалить игру!

Хочу расставить всё по полкам.
Итак, как все говорят после обновы игра стала просто невыносима, я с этим частично согласен т.к:
1. Игра начала выдавать ошибки и потерю соединения (иногда).
2. Хитбоксы стали ещё более тупыми и непонятными, раньше это было не так часто и заметно, но теперь это стало РЕАЛЬНО обычным делом.
3. Анимации и интерфейс стали глупыми и несерьёзными, про походку терминатора при обычной ходьбе я вообще молчу, раньше анимации были реально похожи на то, что персонаж чувствует, сейчас же это тупо реворк анимации для реворка анимации.
Но во всей этой суете есть и что-то хорошее, разрабы поняли, что сделали дичь и решили переделать интерфейс, а также (возможно) и анимации. На этом все положительные стороны и закончились. Надеюсь, что разрабы это всё пофиксят ибо иначе они потеряют много игроков, да и тем более в основном рпзрабы делают деньги не на игре, а на скинах. Лично я играть дальше в дбд буду, но впечатление эта ситуация подпортила.
its fun just get over the skill curve and youre in
un juego muy bueno , muy diferente a otros juegos! me encanta la manera en que los demas compañeros de equipo son altruistas y que decir si quieres ser despiado pues juega de asesino.

I instantly fell in love with this game the first time I saw someone play it! Since then I watched a lot of videos of my favourite youtubers and streamers and got more and more addicted to the game. I only can recommend this, especially if you have a group of friends that also enjoys the game!
P.S. Please buff Legion, they need some sort of buff, thx developers :)

This is a game that my opinions on have changed over time.  I remember back when there were no dedicated servers, fewer characters, and I had 89.6 hours.  Back then, I had reviewed this game positively.  However, I must do otherwise.  


One thing you may have noticed is that, at the time of this review, I have 937.9 hours, which is no small amount (it may be for this game, but that's still a hefty investment in general).  So, to address that: 

This game is the only viable one of its kind.  Friday the 13th is dead in the water (and was a much more casual game, anyway).  Deathgarden a) was owned by BHVR and b) shut down its servers.  Evolve has also died and never quite had that same draw.  That is why I have the several hundred hours I do.

This game is a blatant cash-grab made by disinterested developers who do not care about their playerbase and who will only do what it takes to constantly receive money.  The licensed characters, not addressing balance, and the number of bugs are all examples of this.  The game is broken in so many ways.

If you are reading this review, I plead with you.  Do [b] not [/b] buy this game.  It is not worth it and the developers do not deserve your money.  It is [b] not [/b] worth it.

I hope I will one day be able to say otherwise.
really good game 10\10 but WARNING  contains jumps screams and heart attacks
